title: Under Armour 's total workforce worldwide from 2009 to 2019
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of employees, with a total of 11 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2017 to 2009.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely positive which exists from 2019 to 2018.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly negative which exists from 2018 to 2017.
gold: Under Armour is an American sporting goods manufacturer , based in Baltimore , Maryland . In 2019 , Under Armour employed about 16,400 people around the world . Under Armour is one of the largest sportswear and sporting goods manufacturers in the world , however it is still far behind Nike and adidas who are the dominating companies within this industry .
